channel.title: Posts on Wintervale, ME
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Wintervale, ME

item.title: Discord and Incompatibility.
item.description: Half of this is my fault. Half of this is Discord’s fault. Half of this other people’s fault. Which one doesn’t fit in the 100%? I wish I knew.

item.title: Discord and Communication.
item.description: I’m going to preface this by saying this happens to every company. Discord isn’t an exception, it just so happens to be the next in line, much to my dismay.

item.title: Discord and File Hosting.
item.description:
It turns out a lot of people use Discord as a file host. Probably because:

  • It’s quick
  • It’s easy
  • It’s free*

item.title: Discord.
item.description: I’ve been on Discord for a long time. Since 2016, even.
